1004120.name: Coffee for Coding
1004120.description:
Support for caffeine deprived devs plus some awesome RBQ cards for you!

Coffee for coding is an initiative inspired by our faithful fans who have expressed the desire to reward our efforts in delivering DLCs and frequent updates.
I'll not say 'no' to some loose change coming our way. That can be used for more coffee = more coding, right? ;)
I also included a gift for all those who wish to say thanks – decks of RBQ Cards, in the form of high resolution jpgs, featuring gorgeous character artwork!
You can use the cards for role playing games, or just enjoy the drawings.

So enjoy and thank you for your continuous support!

Note: Once downloaded, you will find the cards in your RBQ folder
1004120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
